inline.description:
1. Open a channel where the slash command bindings are available
2. Type /com.mattermost.test valid empty_from
inline.expectedResult: The apps makes an ephemeral system post that says "Ok"

inline.description:
1. Open a channel where the slash command bindings are available
2. Type /com.mattermost.test valid with_form
3. Add test by typing --text "hello"
3. Click above to add quotes
4. Send
inline.expectedResult:
On 4. Quotes are added
On 5. The apps makes an ephemeral system post that says "Ok"

inline.description:
1. Open a channel where the slash command bindings are available
2. Type /com.mattermost.test valid no_form
3. Add test by typing --text "hello"
3. Click above to add quotes
4. Send
inline.testData: Not sure if it sure add quotes
inline.expectedResult:
On 4. Quotes are added
On 5. The apps makes an ephemeral system post that says "Ok"

inline.description:
1. Open a channel where the slash command bindings are available
2. Type /com.mattermost.test valid lookup --lookup
3. Select sv1 from the available options
4. Send
inline.testData: Not sure if it sure add quotes
inline.expectedResult: No error or response is seen in the lookup call

inline.description:
1. Open a channel where the slash command bindings are available
2. Type /com.mattermost.test valid empty_lookup --lookup
inline.testData: Not sure if it sure add quotes
inline.expectedResult: Help tip shows "Received no data for dynamic suggestion"
